panels.title: 内存

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", avg(data_mem_total_m) as "y_axis_1", avg(data_mem_available_m) as "y_axis_3"  FROM "service"  WHERE kind = '_sys' AND dataex = 'mem'  GROUP BY x_axis_1

panels.title: 硬盘

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp, '1 minute') as "x_axis_1", avg(data_disk_free_m) as "y_axis_1", avg(data_disk_total_m) as "y_axis_2"  FROM "service"  WHERE kind = '_sys' AND dataex IN ('disk_/dev/vda1')  GROUP BY x_axis_1

panels.title: 内存使用率

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp, '1 minute') as "x_axis_1", avg(data_mem_used_percent) as "y_axis_2"  FROM "service"  WHERE dataex = 'mem'  GROUP BY x_axis_1

panels.title: 硬盘使用率

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp, '1 minute') as "x_axis_1", avg(data_disk_used_percent) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "service"  WHERE dataex = 'disk_/dev/vda1'  GROUP BY x_axis_1

panels.title: cpu使用率

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp, '1 minute') as "x_axis_1", avg(data_cpu_percent) as "y_axis_2"  FROM "service"  WHERE dataex = 'cpu'  GROUP BY x_axis_1

panels.title: QPS10SAVG

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp,'10 second') as "x_axis_1", (count(1)/10) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "api"  WHERE kind = 'api'  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

panels.title: 响应时间P99

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", approx_percentile_cont(latency, 0.99) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "api"  WHERE kind = 'api'  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(status) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "api"  WHERE status = 404 AND kind = 'api'  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

panels.title: 400数量

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(status) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "api"  WHERE status IN (400) AND kind = 'api'  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

panels.title: p90

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", approx_percentile_cont(latency, 0.9) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "api"  WHERE kind = 'api'  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

panels.title: 500数量

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp) as "x_axis_1", count(status) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "api"  WHERE status = 500  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC

panels.title: qps1s

queries.query: SELECT histogram(_timestamp, '1 second') as "x_axis_1", count(1) as "y_axis_1"  FROM "api"  WHERE kind = 'api'  GROUP BY x_axis_1 ORDER BY x_axis_1 ASC
